--   type:      Oracle Database 11g




CREATE TABLE Bill
  (
    bill_number        int (6) NOT NULL  ,
    amount             int (4) NOT NULL ,
    time_of_order      DATE NOT NULL ,
    recieve_time       DATE NOT NULL ,
    Courier_id int (4) NOT NULL ,
    User_id       int (4) NOT NULL ,
    address            VARCHAR (100) NOT NULL 
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Bill AUTO_INCREMENT=1000;
ALTER TABLE Bill ADD CONSTRAINT Bill_PK PRIMARY KEY ( bill_number ) ;


CREATE TABLE Chef
  (
    chef_id int (4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name    VARCHAR (20) NOT NULL ,
    cnic    VARCHAR (14) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT Chef_PK PRIMARY KEY ( chef_id ),
    CONSTRAINT Chef_cnic_UN UNIQUE ( cnic ) 
  ) ;

CREATE TABLE Courier
  (
    courier_id  int (4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name        VARCHAR (20) NOT NULL ,
    bike_number VARCHAR (11) NOT NULL ,
    cnic        VARCHAR (14) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT Courier_PK PRIMARY KEY ( courier_id ), 
    CONSTRAINT Courier_bike_number_UN UNIQUE ( bike_number ),
    CONSTRAINT Courier_cnic_UN UNIQUE ( cnic )
  ) ;



CREATE TABLE Food
  (
    food_id        VARCHAR (5) NOT NULL ,
    name           VARCHAR  (15) NOT NULL ,
    cost           int (4) NOT NULL ,
    category VARCHAR (15) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Food ADD CHECK ( category IN ('Dessert', 'Main', 'Starter')) ;
ALTER TABLE Food ADD CONSTRAINT Food_PK PRIMARY KEY ( food_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Food_Chef
  (
    Chef_id   int (4) NOT NULL ,
    category VARCHAR (15) NOT NULL 
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Food_Chef ADD CHECK ( Food_Type IN ('Dessert', 'Main', 'Starter')) ;


CREATE TABLE Food_Types
  ( category VARCHAR (15) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Food_Types ADD CHECK ( category IN ('Dessert', 'Main', 'Starter')) ;
ALTER TABLE Food_Type ADD CONSTRAINT Food_Type_PK PRIMARY KEY ( category ) ;


CREATE TABLE Orders
  (
    orderdate             DATE NOT NULL ,
    bill_number        int (6) NOT NULL ,
    Food_id       VARCHAR (5) NOT NULL ,
    User_id       int (4) NOT NULL ,
    Chef_id       int (4) NOT NULL
  ) ;


CREATE TABLE Users
  (
    user_id  int (4) NOT NULL ,
    name     VARCHAR (20) NOT NULL ,
    password VARCHAR (25) NOT NULL ,
    role     VARCHAR (10) DEFAULT 'User'
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Users ADD CHECK ( role IN ('Admin', 'User')) ;
ALTER TABLE Users ADD CONSTRAINT User_PK PRIMARY KEY ( user_id ) ;


ALTER TABLE Bill ADD CONSTRAINT Bill_Courier_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Courier_id ) REFERENCES Courier ( courier_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Bill ADD CONSTRAINT Bill_User_FK FOREIGN KEY ( User_id ) REFERENCES Users ( user_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Food_Chef ADD CONSTRAINT Food_Chef_Chef_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Chef_id ) REFERENCES Chef ( chef_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Food_Chef ADD CONSTRAINT Food_Chef_Category_FK FOREIGN KEY ( category ) REFERENCES Food_Types ( category ) ;

ALTER TABLE Food ADD CONSTRAINT Food_Category_FK FOREIGN KEY ( category ) REFERENCES Food_Types ( category ) ;

ALTER TABLE Orders ADD CONSTRAINT Order_Chef_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Chef_id ) REFERENCES Chef ( chef_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Orders ADD CONSTRAINT Order_Food_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Food_id ) REFERENCES Food ( food_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Orders ADD CONSTRAINT Order_User_FK FOREIGN KEY ( User_id ) REFERENCES Users ( user_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Orders ADD CONSTRAINT Order_Bill_number_FK FOREIGN KEY ( bill_number ) REFERENCES Bill ( bill_number ) ;
